title: Our Work Showcase
sub-title: Stuff that made our clients happy

items.title: Spanish Property Portal
items.features: Four language Specific Sites,Database,Downloads,Admin Backend,JSON Search,Download Library,Bespoke CMS,Bespoke Statc Site Generator, Lead Capture
items.description_markdown: Maxgoldhouse is an estate agent with offices in Spain, Belgium. Germany and the UK. Four static websites (English, French, German and Dutch) are generated from a central database. Once built the websites are transferred to 4 separate live servers.  An admin application allows management of the property database and a bespoke system for generating personalised response emails to enquiries.

items.title: Regional Inward Investment Portal - Work In Progress
items.features: Static Site, Download, Interactive Map, CLoud based CMS,Bespoke CMS widgets,Data Management,Stageing and Live versions of website, Lead Capture,CRM integration
items.description_markdown: Invest Essex is the inward investment agency for the county of Essex in the United Kingdom. The Invest Essex team wanted a CMS which would allow them to manage various content types as well as the option to easily add new content types. The limits of their current CMS does not allow this. By moving images to a separate Distribution Network both build time and website page load times have improved by 80%.

items.title: Music and Video Showcase - Greysecond
items.features: Blog, Shop, One page Multimedia Showcase
items.description_markdown: The members of the Greysecond team did not want a simple run of the mill website. The resulting site is an original multimedia show with an information panel. The information panel houses an online shop and a blog. On mobile devices large video files are only downloaded if the user triggers them.

items.title: Clarity Strategies - Inward Investment Marketing Specialists
items.description_markdown: Clarity-Strategies delivers marketing solutions for Inward Investment Agencies.

items.title: Steevdore Stuff
items.description_markdown: A Life of Sweat and Blood from Times Gone By
